title: doTERRA On Guard+ Protective Blend Softgels | dTERRA Essential Oils
description: These softgels support and maintain healthy immune function when seasonal threats are high.*
cleaned_text: Primary Benefits - May support healthy immune system function, according to preclinical data.* - May protect against threats to the immune system, according to preclinical research.* Contributes to a positive, calming environment and may support a healthy inflammatory response with its limonene content when ingested, according to preclinical and clinical research.* Provides powerful antioxidant properties and may support a healthy inflammatory and oxidative stress response with its eugenol and -Caryophyllene content when ingested, according to preclinical testing.* Is high in monoterpenes and sesquiterpenes known for their antioxidant activity and ability to help ward off environmental and seasonal threats when used internally.* Effectively cleanses and was once more valuable than gold! Offers cleansing properties because of its main chemical constituent, 1,8-Cineole. Is also known as Eucalyptus globulus, which is now part of the blend in the new Eucalyptus essential oil. Renews and rejuvenates when taken internally.* Provides antioxidant properties.* Possesses powerful cleansing properties, according to a preliminary controlled study and other preclinical studies.* More confirming clinical research is needed. May support a healthy inflammatory response when taken internally, according to preclinical studies.* More confirming clinical research is needed. Video disabled by your privacy settings Learn How doTERRA On Guard Works and Can Benefit Your Family doTERRA On Guard provides natural, effective immune support when taken internally.* Use doTERRA On Guard products to support yourself and your family. Take one or more softgels as needed to promote healthy immune function.* Keep out of reach of children. If you're pregnant, nursing, or under a doctor's care, consult your physician. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefit your home and loved ones with these softgels. It's always good to keep doTERRA On Guard+ Softgels in stock. Learn more about how these softgels can help protect you and your family against immune system threats.* Using essential oils internally can provide you with great health benefits.* Each softgel has special properties that can assist in your daily life. Allison Preiss discusses simple adjustments you can make to your lifestyle, her favorite products for protecting her home (like the doTERRA On Guard family), and more! *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
